properties.displayName: Potential Arbitrary Command Execution Using Msdt.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\msdt.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "msdt.exe") and (ProcessCommandLine contains "IT_BrowseForFile=" or (ProcessCommandLine contains " PCWDiagnostic" and (ProcessCommandLine contains " -af " or ProcessCommandLine contains " /af ")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects processes leveraging the "ms-msdt" handler or the "msdt.exe" binary to execute arbitrary commands as seen in the follina (CVE-2022-30190) vulnerability
